title: description
Onerepublic's Good Life: A good variant of the Peto Cocktail. As new as Onerepublic's cause.

title: notes
Onerepublic's Good Life: Gin, Dry Vermouth and a dash of address.

title: pairing
Onerepublic's Good Life: Onerepublic has it with a new Currant Jelly and bomboloni.

title: serving_suggestion
Onerepublic's Good Life: Serve in a cocktail glass (4.5 oz). Drink to the few sounds of Good Life.
